metadata.synopsis: The player entered combat with Ketheric's Hound on the upper floor of Moonrise (most likely within Ketheric's room). The hound barks to call one of the scrying eyes over to their location.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to Moonrise Toweroe executiondoneGo to Ketheric's room (-167; 37; -172)Be spotted by the HoundLeave dialog to enter combat

0.speaker: Squire
0.context: NodeContext: Calling guards down on us
